attributes.action: To speed up the time it takes to get a statement so a child can get right support in classroom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In many cases children with learning problems such as ADHD and other related learning problems can wait for upto 4 year to get a statement so they can get support in the classroom. I think this is wrong and may bring other problems other than the learning problem its self.
I would like to see children get extra support straight away while waiting for staements aat the same time sppeeding the whole process up. It can take up to two month to see one expert the you have to go see some one else and you are just back and forth. this is wrong!!.
please support this petition.
